social.friends

Class FriendsCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • social.friends.FriendsCtrl

  • public class FriendsCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
    The FriendsCtrl class facilitates the interaction between the database and the FriendsMenu
    Version:
    1.1 05 Apr 2020
    Author:
    Wa Thone

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FriendsCtrl()
      Creates a FriendsCtrl object with a default FriendshipManager, RequestAccepter, RequestSender

      • unfriendFriend

        public boolean unfriendFriend(User user1,
                              User user2)
        Unfriends the specified user1 from user2 and updates the Friends table in database
        Parameters:
        user1 - the User object of the friend being unfriended
        user2 - the User object of the one doing the unfriending
        Returns:
        true upon successful unfriending, false otherwise

      • getFriendRequestValidityType

        public java.lang.String getFriendRequestValidityType(java.lang.String receiverUsername,
                                                     User requestor)
        Gets the validity type of the friend request sent from specified requestor to user of specified receiver username
        Parameters:
        receiverUsername - the username of the person to send friend request to
        requestor - the User object of the ser sending the request
        Returns:
        specific error messages if invalid. Else, returns "valid"

      • sendFriendRequest

        public boolean sendFriendRequest(java.lang.String receiverUsername,
                                 User requestor)
        Sends friend request to the specified receiver username from requestor
        Parameters:
        receiverUsername - the username of the user to send request to
        requestor - the User object of the user sending request
        Returns:
        true upon successful sending, false otherwise

      • acceptFriendRequest

        public boolean acceptFriendRequest(User requestor,
                                   User receiver)
        Accepts friend request from the specified requestor user by receiver
        Parameters:
        requestor - the User object of the requestor
        receiver - the User object of the receiver
        Returns:
        true upon successful accepting, false otherwise

      • rejectFriendRequest

        public boolean rejectFriendRequest(User requestor,
                                   User receiver)
        rejects friend request from the specified requestor user by the receiver
        Parameters:
        requestor - the User object of the requestor
        receiver - the User object of the receiver
        Returns:
        true upon successful rejecting, false otherwise
